description:
I CAN’T BE SILENT ANY LONGER. I can’t scroll past another post of a mom sharing her anguish as she tries to figure out why her child had such a bad reaction after getting their scheduled immunizations. ⁣
⁣
I can’t stay silent about what I have learned about HEALTH and how to combat all the harmful things we put in our body. ⁣
⁣
I can’t stay silent about how AMAZING God designed our bodies to be-self aware, self healing, and so incredibly strong! ⁣
⁣
I can’t stay silent about how much I love God and how grateful I am for everything He’s blessed me with. 
⁣
I can’t be silent about how much I love this country which I why I call out government overreach and corruption! ⁣
⁣
I can’t be silent about the medical mafia and how pharma puts their profits before people’s health. ⁣
⁣
I can’t be silent about human trafficking. ⁣
⁣
I can’t be silent about injustice. ⁣
And I won’t be. 
SILENCE IS CONSENT. 
And I do not consent.
